subject: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I am a Norway Citizen, I am married to Late Mr. Cronje Lauwers, a politician who owns a small gold company in Ghana;  He died of Leprosy and Radesyge, in the year February 2019, During his lifetime he deposited the sum of € 8.5 Million Euro) Eight million, Five hundred thousand Euros in a bank in Europe The money was from the sale of his company and death benefits payment and entitlements of my deceased husband by his company.
I am sending you this message with heavy tears in my eyes and, and also praying that it will reach you in good health because I am not in good health, I sleep every night without knowing if I may be alive to see the next day. which has become difficult for me to move around. I was married to my late husband for more than 6 years without having a child and my doctor confided that I have less chance to live, having to know when the cup of death will come, I decided to contact you to claim the fund since I don't have any relation, I grew up from an orphanage home.
I have decided to donate this money for the support of helping Motherless babies, less privileged, Widows and churches also to build the house of God because I am dying and diagnosed with cancer for about 3 years ago. I have decided to donate from what I have inherited from my late husband to you for the good work of Almighty God; I will be going in for an operation surgery soon.
I need your urgent answer to know if you will be able to execute this project, and I will give you more information on how the fund will be transferred to your bank account or online banking. Reply me at   
mrsnoralauwers@gmail.com
Thanks
Mrs. Nora Lauwers

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Hello Mrs. Nora Lauwers,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your story and your intentions to donate the money for a noble cause. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult circumstances you are facing, and I hope this message finds you in good health.

I would be interested to learn more about how this project will be executed and how the funds will be transferred. Could you please provide me with more details on the process? Additionally, could you clarify which specific organizations or causes the donations will be directed towards?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Greetings Beloved Bruce

I found your email id in the business directory i see in the hospital and i
decided to contact you for this project because my heart accepted you. As I
told you earlier, when my husband was alive he made a deposit of  € 8.5
Million Euro. Knowing my condition I have decided to donate this money out
for charity purposes. Beloved one, I want to transfer this money to you, I
want you to use at least 70% of this money to visit orphanage homes, help
the poor, sick ones in the hospital and women with cancer and churches also
to build the house of God then take the remaining amount to take care of
your home because every worker deserves his wages. I took this decision
because I don't have any child that will inherit this money,  I decided to
contact you to claim the fund since I don't have any relation, I grew up
from an orphanage home. I am still in Hospital and my condition is getting
worse every day.

So do get back to me with your full contact details, like:
Your Full Name:
Home address:
Nationality:
Personal Telephone Number:
Occupation:
Sex and Age:

As soon as I received the above requested information from you, then I will
give you the contact details of the bank where the fund was deposited by my
late husband for direction on how to retrieve this fund.

Please respond as soonest
Thanks
Mrs. Nora Lauwers

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Hello Mrs. Nora Lauwers,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about your condition, and I appreciate your kind intentions to donate the money for charity purposes. It's a noble cause indeed.

Before we proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the project? I would like to know how exactly the funds will be transferred and what steps need to be taken. Additionally, could you share some details about your late husband and his profession?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Hello Mrs. Nora Lauwers,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about your condition, and I appreciate your kind intentions to help those in need through this donation. It's a noble cause indeed.

Before we proceed, I would like to know more about the details of this project. Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to understand how the funds were deposited and what steps need to be taken to retrieve them from the bank.

Also, it would be helpful if you could share more about your late husband, Mr. Cronje Lauwers. What was his occupation or source of income? And why did he choose me specifically for this project?

Once I have a better understanding of the situation, I will be able to assist you further. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Hello Mrs. Nora Lauwers,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about your condition, and I appreciate your kind intentions to help those in need through this donation. It's a noble cause indeed.

Before we proceed, I would like to know more about the details of this project. Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, I would like to understand how the funds were deposited and what steps need to be taken to retrieve them from the bank.

Also, it would be helpful if you could share any documentation or proof regarding the existence of these funds and their intended purpose for charitable causes. This will ensure transparency and build trust in our collaboration.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Kindly go to my first message to you and read it very well. All you asked
is there.

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
How many times will I explain to you? Why repeat this message every time?
Go back to our previous message and read it very well.

body:

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Hello! Thank you for responding. I apologize if I missed something in your previous message. Could you please remind me of what you mentioned? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: My name is Mrs. Nora Lauwers I
body:
Hello there! I apologize if it seems like I'm repeating myself. Sometimes, I just want to make sure I fully understand the information you're sharing. Could you please remind me of the key points from our previous message? Thank you!

Best wishes,
Bruce
